Title: S7 ep. 306 Juan Santos - A Renaissance Man in the World of Tech
Description:
Disclaimer: We experienced audio problems that were unfortunately not able to be corrected.  We hope you will find Juan’s interview interesting and leave us comments about his responses. 

 

This guest epitomizes the definition of a Renaissance Man. Juan Santos is the Senior Vice President of Brand Experience and Innovation with Tavistock.  He has 20+ years of creating magical experiences and been involved in award-winning, transformational work such as the first worldwide webcast for Earth Day, Coca-Cola’s loyalty program My Coke Rewards. 

Mattel’s shift from toys to play through the creation of BarbieGirls.com and implementing the largest autonomous public transit network in Lake Nona.

 

When asked about his five words that he said describe him, he replied with Ductile, Whimsical, Doer, Servant, Creator. If you do not know what ductile means, please listen to the show. No hints in the show notes. I challenge you to use it in a sentence or two also to expand other people’s vocabularies. 

 

There are 3 interesting take aways from this interview. 

  1. What virtual reality was like in the early 2000’s
  2. How he landed a job with Mattel and the skills he needed at that time.
  3. How does projection mapping play into the Future of Work and cool tech?
